title: Setup Sequelize Model
description: Finalize the Task model definition, including all necessary attributes and associations.

title: Configure Database Connection
description: Establish a stable connection to the PostgreSQL/MySQL database using the provided credentials in 'config/db.ts'.

title: Implement API Route for Tasks
description: Create GET, POST, PUT, and DELETE endpoints for managing tasks (CRUD operations).

title: Write Unit Tests for Model
description: Develop comprehensive unit tests to ensure the Task model behaves as expected.

title: Design Front-End Task List
description: Create the initial HTML/React component structure for displaying the list of tasks.

title: Debug Task Creation Bug
description: Investigate and resolve the issue where new tasks are being saved without a 'title'.

title: Review PR #42: Database Seeding
description: Check the pull request that adds the initial data seeding script for the Task model.

title: Update Documentation
description: Document the new Task model and its API endpoints in the project README.

title: Refactor Task Controller Logic
description: Clean up the code in the Task controller to improve readability and performance.

title: Plan Next Sprint Features
description: Meet with the team to define tasks for the upcoming development sprint.

title: Optimize Database Indexes
description: Review and improve indexing strategy for faster query performance.

title: Add Task Archive Feature
description: Implement the ability to archive completed tasks.

title: Create Task Filter UI
description: Add UI controls for filtering tasks by tags and priority.

title: Improve API Error Handling
description: Enhance API routes with better error messages and validation.

title: Integrate Logging Library
description: Add a centralized logging solution using Winston or Pino.

title: Add Task Comments Feature
description: Allow users to add and view comments on tasks.

title: Set Up CI/CD Pipeline
description: Configure automatic testing and deployment pipeline with GitHub Actions.

title: Accessibility Audit
description: Review front-end components for WCAG compliance.

title: Add Dark Mode
description: Implement a dark mode toggle for the UI.

title: Implement Rate Limiting
description: Add rate limiting to prevent API abuse.

title: Research OAuth Providers
description: Evaluate Google and GitHub OAuth for user authentication.

title: Implement User Authentication
description: Add authentication and authorization layers to the API.

title: Create Task Activity Log
description: Track updates, deletions, and status changes for each task.

title: Add Pagination to Task API
description: Improve performance by paginating responses.

title: Build Task Analytics Dashboard
description: Provide visual statistics on completed vs pending tasks.

title: Write Integration Tests
description: Ensure the API endpoints behave correctly with real database operations.

title: Add Webhooks Support
description: Trigger webhooks when tasks are created or completed.

title: Implement Caching Layer
description: Use Redis to cache frequent API responses.

title: Update README with Deployment Steps
description: Add documentation for running the app in production.

title: Perform Security Audit
description: Analyze the system for potential vulnerabilities and apply patches.
